html: The "redeemed of the Lord" who were to "return, and come with singing unto Zion" with "everlasting joy" are identified in the Doctrine and Covenants as the Latter-day Saints (see D&C 45:71; 66:11; 101:18). The return has begun, but it will not be completed until the center place of Zion is built up "that the prophets might be fulfilled" (D&C 101:19).
